short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block Stack Overflow tabs late at night so you can stop debugging and go to bed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you find yourself debugging and searching Stack Overflow until the wee hours of the morning, then SleepyStack can help you get the rest you need! All you have to do is set the window of time during which you want to be locked out of Stack Overflow, and SleepyStack will do the rest. You can also adjust the number of tabs threshold and apply it to other domains.
